but its movement is too slow: the mirror match took a heavy toll andthe spirit is weakened.
it is also not in yuyami's interest to allow the girl to escape.

name: yuyami
normalized: you are not getting away♪
*smack!

name: towako
normalized: *groans*.
towako's body cannot get out of the way of her vicious punch.
she crumbles to the ground.
the last bit of her energy drains away andshe loses consciousness.

name: yuyami
normalized: resisting to the end.
truly a fearsome character.
but you missed myheart by 2 cm.
a knife handle is sticking out from yuyami's chest, just a little bitaside from the place where a heart should be.
towako used her remaining strength to toss it as she was falling.

name: yuyami
normalized: i would've been dead by now if not for my regeneration.
the woman grips the knife and pulls it out of her flesh.
crimson blood gushes out from the hole, only to stop in the nextinstant.

name: koso
normalized: what a scary lass…i won't be able to summon my spirit patron for awhile…
koso staggers and gets up.
did he use some kind of healing magic?
his wounds are already healed.

name: towako
normalized: （is this…how i…meet my end?
darkness is quickly swallowing what remains of towako's consciousness.

name: towako
normalized: （damn…i couldn't avenge…my senior…）

name: towako
normalized: （forgive me…miss sakura…）
she can vaguely hear koso calming the onlookers down by claiming thisfight was a 'diviner operation'.

name: towako
normalized: （damn…damn it…）
someone approaches her and towako hears koso's voice.

name: koso
normalized: i hold no grudge against you, but you have to disappear.

name: towako
normalized: （die…asshole…）
the young girl's mind finally sinks into the darkness…
